name: Generic Quest!
description:
A game made in two days for a mini jam. It uses generic RPG Maker assets, hence the name, Generic Quest!

Three college students find themselves transported to a world straight out of an old school RPG. They are the heroes of prophesy, said to have come to save the world. Only, the world is fine. There is no war, no outstanding threats to speak of. Their only way home is to save the world, but what are they to do if the world simply does not need saving?

Content Warning: Foul Language (the f word is said a lot)
